name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer proficient in **TypeScript**, **NodeJS**, **Express**, **MySQL**, **Redis**, and cloud services like **AWS**. Experienced in leveraging **Elasticsearch**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana** for enhanced application performance and monitoring. Skilled in front-end development using **Angular**, **React**, and **Vue.js**, ensuring responsive and user-centric designs. With a robust background in designing scalable and reliable applications, I have successfully implemented complex solutions across diverse sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, achieving significant improvements through automation and a commitment to clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **NodeJS**, **Express**, and **MySQL** to design and implement scalable backend services, resulting in a **40%** increase in query efficiency.
Developed real-time applications with **TypeScript** and **Redis**, enhancing data retrieval speed by **30%**.
Integrated **Elasticsearch** for advanced search functionality, improving data access response times by **50%**.
Created responsive front-end applications using **Angular** and **React**, decreasing load times by **25%** through optimized code practices.
Implemented CI/CD practices with **Git** and **AWS**, achieving a **70%** reduction in release cycles.
Monitored application performance using **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, ensuring system health and reliability.
Participated in code reviews and team collaboration sessions, sharing best practices that fostered a productive team environment.

• Developed backend services using **Node.js** and **Express**, increasing application performance by **30%**.
• Conducted database management utilizing **MySQL**, enhancing data retrieval speed by **20%**.
• Integrated caching solutions with **Redis** to optimize system efficiency, reducing load times by **15%**.
• Employed Git for version control, managing over **50** releases in a collaborative environment.
• Implemented Elasticsearch for powerful search capabilities in applications, resulting in a **40%** improvement in search response time.
• Collaborated in cross-functional teams to design user interfaces using **React** and **Angular**, enhancing user experience and engagement by **25%**.
• Created comprehensive monitoring solutions with **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, maintaining system health and performance metrics.
• Deployed applications on **AWS**, utilizing cloud services to improve scalability and stability, yielding a **99.9%** uptime rate.
• Contributed to the automation of testing and deployment processes with tools like **Jenkins**, ensuring a smooth CI/CD pipeline.

• Developed scalable web applications using **NodeJS** and **Express**, ensuring seamless integration with **MySQL** to handle up to **10,000** concurrent users.  
• Leveraged **TypeScript** for enhanced type safety and maintainability across all projects, improving code reliability by **25%**.  
• Utilized **Redis** for caching mechanisms, decreasing data retrieval times by **50%** and optimizing overall application performance.  
• Implemented monitoring solutions using **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to track system metrics, achieving a **95%** incident detection rate.  
• Collaborated with frontend teams using **Angular**, **React**, and **Vue.js** to deliver a cohesive user experience, leading to a **60%** increase in user engagement.  
• Maintained version control and collaborative development practices with **Git**, ensuring code quality and facilitating team contributions.  
• Integrated **Elasticsearch** for advanced search capabilities, enhancing search speed by **35%**, and improving user satisfaction.  
• Deployed and managed applications on **AWS**, utilizing various services for scaling and optimization, achieving **99.9%** availability.
